Edges-Background -- Female Human Seasoned Eldritch Knight
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Brawny: +1 Strength Step (encumbrance and minimum strength requirements)
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Brave: +2 Spirit vs. fear, -2 fear table roll
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4+2 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1
Healing: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d6
Languages: Celestial; Common; Draconic; Druidic; Giant; Goblin; Halfling
Skill Notes:
Alertness: +2 Notice
Brute: Advances Athletics relative to Strength/May use Strength vs. Athletics Tests
Linguist: +3 Language Count
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Very Attractive: Increased Attractive effects
Aristocrat: +2 Persuasion (networking with aristocrats)/+2 Common Knowledge (etiquette, heraldry, gossip)
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Attractive: +2 Performance (attracted target)/+2 Persuasion (attracted target)
Charismatic: May reroll Persuasion
Fame: +2 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Size: 1 Alignment: Neutral Deity: None
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Description Notes: Brawny: +1 Size
Features
Edges (6 points): Alertness; Ambidextrous; Arcane Background (Civilization Domain); Arcane Background (Magic); Arcane Background (Miracles); Arcane Resistance; Aristocrat; Attractive; Brave; Brawny; Brute; Charismatic; Elan; Fame; Famous; Fast Healer; Fleet-Footed; Great Luck; Improved Arcane Resistance; Linguist; Luck; Quick; Very Attractive Hindrances: Mean; One Eye+; Suspicious Human Abilities: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Magic): Has Armor Interference feature
Arcane Background (Miracles): Has Domain and Vow+ features
Domain: +1 Edge Points (domain)
Famous: Increased Fame effects
Great Luck: Increased Luck effects
Elan: +2 on Benny-purchased Trait rerolls
Fame: 5x fee from performing
Luck: +2 Benny each session
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
One Eye+: Suffers -2 on visual tasks 5" distant
Suspicious: Trusts no one
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 8 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (0) Pace/Run: 8/+d8
Armor: None Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Scythe (d6+d6); Spear (d6+d6 R3"); Trident (d6+d6 R3" AP 1); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Brawny: +1 Toughness
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run Step
Improved Arcane Resistance: Increased Arcane Resistance effects
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Ambidextrous: Suffers no off-hand penalty/Parry bonuses from two weapons stack
Arcane Resistance: Foes suffer -4 arcane skill and arcane damage when targeting self
Brute: +1/+2/+4 thrown weapon range
Fast Healer: +2 Vigor (natural healing) and may check every 3 dy
Quick: May redraw Action Cards lower than 6
Arcana
Power Count: 6 Power Points: 20
Powers:
Blind: (2 PP Necr) R6" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Bolt: (1 PP Evoc) R12" Target suffers 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); Epic +2 PP Incapacitating damage disintegrates (Vigor neg); Epic +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon; Epic +2 PP ROF 2)
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Target recovers from 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in the past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; Epic +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Protection: (2 PP Abju) R6" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Magic): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Miracles): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Civilization Domain): Has access to additional Powers
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 6 available vs. 23 allocated
